website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular diaper caddy lauded for its extra- large design and cute style.
pros: Incredibly large size for those wanting an oversized caddy
Comes with 3 color options for handles and interior fabric
High-quality felt designed to keep its shape over time
cons: A little too large for some customers

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower must have!!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo, we gifted the caddy for a friend’s first baby. I liked the fact that the internal dividers could be moved as they were attached with Velcro. It was a lovely soft grey colour and I thought the leather handles would stand wear & tear better. It was a little smaller than I expected but still made a beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs EL Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag for my car! I can fit plenty of diapers and wipes as well as a roll of paper towels, Lysol wipes, a big thing of purell, and a bag of smaller misc items. The outer pockets are great for pens, sunglasses, sunscreen and more. I really like the handles so I can
customer_reviews.author: Verna Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Adorable organizer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this caddy for our 4th baby due this summer. I was a little surprised when I opened the box and noticed the fabric is kind of a felt material. That's why I gave 4 stars. Aside from that it does seem durable and will definitely serve its purpose. There are lots of outer pockets for creams and such, very handy! I love the leather looking carry handles. Warning: it does come completely flattened and the inner dividers must be attached but it only takes a matter of seconds and the weight of diapes, wipes and goodies will get it to keep its shape. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yarn holder
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid crocheter, and finding some way to to hold the various yarns needed for a project has been difficult. Then I decided to try this product, it works perfectly. The felt is great for giving that little bit of friction needed to hold the yarn in place. The side pockets easily hold all the accessories I use in an orderly fashion. And it stands on its own. All in all I highly recommend this product as a yarn basket.
customer_reviews.author: Mokee

customer_reviews.title: Use this as a car organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take stuff out to the car when I leave for work (I work out of my car). It is the perfect size to sit in the passenger footwell or on the seat and hold facemasks, gloves, sanitizer, water, sunglasses, lunch etc. Also the felt means that it doesn't skate around on the carpet or the seat as the car turns & brakes.
customer_reviews.author: junktony

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag for my car! I can fit plenty of diapers and wipes as well as a roll of paper towels, Lysol wipes, a big thing of purell, and a bag of smaller misc items. The outer pockets are great for pens, sunglasses, sunscreen and more. I really like the handles so I can easily move it around my car/trunk and take into the house to restock. My car was a disaster before this bag!
customer_reviews.author: lmac122

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little diaper organizer for the car!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this caddy for my daughter to keep in her car. She loves it! She was previously using a bin and this caddy is much better at keeping the diapers and supplies organized.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Storage of any kind
customer_reviews.text: This product is BEYOND amazing. I am using it as an organizer for my Bible study materials, and with the many compartments and sizable storage options up top, this organizer is perfect! In my opinion, this is even BETTER than organizers that are specifically designed for stationary storage. I am thinking of purchasing another one to use for additional notebooks and office supplies that I have laying loosely around. I would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone who is looking to be more organized and save space.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Possible

customer_reviews.title: Great Grandma's Baby Caddy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very spacious Caddy that has lots of ways to organize things. I love it for having care items for when I babysit our great grand babies that have just been born.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This this is hideous. It’s essentially made out of insulation material. The edges have been treated with heat to seal them off, making them stiff and visibly darker that the rest of the material. The “leather” handles are a joke and embarrassing. Thankfully I only use to it organize diapers and lotions in my baby’s room but I definitely would not recommend this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: SL_McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! Super cute and good quality! Cannot wait to start "using" it when baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. We filled it with books, diapers, wipes, ointment, body wash. Lots of room, nice depth, handles were strong. Very versatile, could be used as a caddy for many things, different stages of baby. Looks great, thick material, nice warm gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Happy567

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute, but has a strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is adorable and has a lot of pockets on the outside. One issue is that it arrived smelling like strong chemicals to the point where it burned my eyes and gave me a headache when I was around it. Since it cannot be machine washed, it is currently sitting outside to “air out” and hopefully that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Jhegna

customer_reviews.title: Best diper caddy ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! Extremely well made and beautiful! The leather handle is so beautiful and I'm so excited to use and will definitely be buying more products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to hold all of the necessities for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to hold all of the necessities for an infant. This is a baby shower gift and I am loading it up with diapers, baby wipes, lotions , bibs etc. The color is perfect because they chosen not to know the sex of the baby. Fabric is soft and the handles are well constructed. I am so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Michael

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is excellent. Fits a lot of stuff and it’s a light to carry around. Very easy to keep organized and reach whatever I need in the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Caddy for my Car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this caddy for my car. I have a 3yr old and this caddy helps keep my car clean & organized! I have wipes, snacks, sanitizer, and lots more in diff compartments. I even designated a compartment for “trash”! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Morin's

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay. The gray is a little lighter than expected. Everything attaches with thin Velcro and is made of stiff felt. Not sure I'll use it as a diaper caddy or not. Just not as pleased with this as I thought I'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal HJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for all your baby’s essentials!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a shower gift and filled it with all kinds of baby essentials. It’s exactly what I wanted and the color goes with just about any baby room theme. Wish I had something this versatile when I had my two little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: VERSATILITY
customer_reviews.text: I KEEP ALL OF MY SMALL STUFF WHICH I CARRY FROM PLACE TO PLACE IN MY APARTMENT. FOR INSTANCE, THE LARGE INNER POCKET I KEEP ALL OF MY CREAMS. ONE OF THE SMALL INNER POCKETS, I KEEP ALL OF MY SMALL ELECTRONIC DEVICES SUCH AS TRAVEL RAZORS, SMALL TRIMMERS ETC.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from a startup entrepreneur
customer_reviews.text: The grey and yellow combination is wonderful, the material is hard enough to stand still but I would prefer softer material as it's a bit harsh We did not use it yet as the baby is still not here, but it should function as needed to be
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a new grandmother to help organize diapers etc., but also to live from room to room as needed. It is very sturdy and unlike the separate compartments. This would also be great if traveling. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny 😍.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for.👍 It's great,well made,cute,a lot of space,just the right size and the price worth. I just loved 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cintia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cleans up the room and I can pack it around the house if needed. I will continue to use this as an organizer even when my baby is no longer in diapers. I love that the separators are Velcro and can be arranged as desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic Diaper Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Ok purchase, kinda flimsy material. Has decent storage, would hold about a box of diapers, which is quite a lot. Overall just ok, nothing really special about this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Practical Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I own and have gifted this product. The velcro compartments are adjustable and you're able to customize according to your needs. Tremendous capacity for all the baby items this can hold.

customer_reviews.title: It's very useful and purposeful.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice and it looks just like the picture. I"m very pleased with it. It serves the purpose as it is intended.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute

Could easily be portable from one room to another. Nursery to den fit the day and then back to the nursery for bedtime. Pretty color and nice construction.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot think of an appropriate heading.

Caddy has lots of pockets for misc baby items and deep pockets with plenty of room for larger items (diapers, wipes) wonderful quality, great products... and mom to be said “she loved it”

customer_reviews.title: Great.

We will be using it in our nursery and to easily take diaper/wipes/etc. up and downstairs and from room to room.

Great product and I will definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Use it for daily hair products to style hair

I keep it inside my storage ottoman when not in use and I bring it out when I do my hair and my kids hair. I like the color, material, and style. It is like an extra thick felt material that holds its shape really well.

I have already received multiple compliments regarding this item in my home. It will definitely get used after its no longer needed for diapers.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It really is exactly how it looks. It’s sturdy and easy to organize. I will be ordering more for my house soon. I almost prefer this over a diaper bag considering the structure and ease of accessing items needed. I love it and am looking forward to getting more.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a shower gift along with other items. We were able to fit quite a few things in this tote, like diapers, lotion, wipes, teething rings, lullaby cd, and clothes. The dividers are perfect. Great product!

product_meta.title: Baby Diaper Caddy Organizer: Large Organizer Tote Bag for Boys Girls Infant - Baby Shower Gift Bag Nursery Must Haves - Registry Favorites - Collapsible Newborn Caddie Car Travel (Leather)
feature_bullets: ❤ GREAT BABY SHOWER GIFT BASKET: A great gift for new mom, one of baby registry must haves. Use this to make a baby shower gift bag - fill it with diapers, wipes, diaper cake or anything you think the new mom would need.

❤ MODERN NURSERY STORAGE ORGANIZER BIN FOR INFANT NEWBORN: Our multi-purpose nursery bin is unisex gender neutral modern design compliments any nursery décor. You can store cloth diapers, wipes, changing pad on changing station, pacifier clip, books, diaper rash cream on your changing station; easy to carry around the house, use as kid travel car organizer, or store arts and crafts, or as crochet storage organizer.
